DOC.detailed_description: A phase 1 study evaluate drug-drug interaction safety Lafutidine Irsogladine maleate healthy adult volunteer . Subjects judge appropriate study screen 28days first administration . Subjects administrate Lafutidine bid period I . After wash-out period , administrate Irsogladine maleate qd Period II . After , coadministration Lafutidine bid Irsogladine maleate qd .
